version_description:
Several bugs have been fixed.
----------------------------------------------
*[Important] Warning regarding iOS 11
This app may not run correctly under iOS 11.
We apologize for the inconvenience that this may cause, and thank you for your kind understanding.

What's New in Version 1.0.7
Several bugs have been fixed.

・Changed “Communication” to “Facebook” (this change fixes app crashes when using this feature)

・Fixed an issue where the character and stage changes unexpectedly during rematches in the Bluetooth mode

・Fixed the shifted tap area of the return button
Fixed an issue where tap operation did not work on some iOS versions.
